titles.title: A bill to designate the Tariff Schedules of the United State to provide rates of duty on imported speedometers used on exercise equipment consistent with those on bicycle speedometers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide a duty on bicycle and exerciser-type speedometers and parts.
